Malik Rose , who attended Drexel, minutes away from the Queen Latifah Union Center, scored a career-high 22 points on 10-of-12 shooting and grabbed nine rebounds as the Spurs snapped a three-game losing streak. My teammates were getting me the ball, said Malik Rose , who bought 64 tickets for family and friends." Carmelo Anthony scored 29 points, Allen Iverson added 28 and the Denver Nuggets spoiled the return of Kevin Garnett , holding on for a 124-118 victory over the Boston Celtics on Tuesday night. Winning this game puts a lot of pressure on us, because if you can beat a team like this, then you can beat all the other teams, Allen Iverson said." We have enough talent to scare some people, but we just have to bring it night in and night out." The Nuggets even beat the Celtics at full strength-- kind of.

Feb. 3, 2003, National Security Council meeting in which Mr. Colin Powell sketched out the presentation he was to make at the United Nations two days later. Mr. Rumsfeld quotes himself as telling the meeting, We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Mr. Colin Powell will talk about it. Khurmal is the name of a village near the site. Mr. Colin Powell objected. In his U.N. presentation, Mr. Colin Powell described it as" Terrorist Poison and Explosive Factory, Khurmal." Mr. Rumsfeld said

, also praised US military personnel working at the site. Mr Donald Rumsfeld was defence secretary from 2001 to 2006 under former president George W Bush.
